document_data.name: Bowdar
document_data.mainbody: '''Bowdar''' was an inhabitant of the city of [[Tantras]] in [[the Vast]]. Bowdar owned [[Bowdar's Wagonworks]], which was dedicated to the construction and repair of wagons.
